overview: A couple must redefine their marriage of five years after they both realize they’re gay. Karina and Sergio catapult into the unknown in a hilarious and heartfelt journey that explores how they got here while asking “what now?”  Faced with the reality of two very different gay scenes, they must figure out how to find themselves, without losing each other.
tagline: When you love something, let it gay.
title: Out in Love
